Package hac.ex4.beans

Class BasketList

java.lang.Object
hac.ex4.beans.BasketList
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Component public class BasketList extends Object implements Serializable
Bean containing the basket list.
See Also:

    Field

    private ArrayList<BasketBook>
    basketList
    List of books added to basket.

    Description

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    add(Book book)
    Get a book and if doesn't exist add this book to the list, if it is existing already - increase quantity of this book by 1.
    void
    clear()
    Clear the list.
    Integer
    count()
    Count how many items in the basket list (if a book is appearing twice its count for different items).
    void
    decreaseBook(long idBook)
    Get an ID of a book and decrease 1 book in the basket that has the same ID, and if the quantity of this particular book reach to 0 then delete this book from the list.
    void
    deleteBook(long idBook)
    Get an ID of a book and delete the book in the list that has this ID.
    BasketBook
    findById(long idBook)
    Get an ID of a book and return the basket book item that correspond to this ID.
    ArrayList<BasketBook>
    getBasketList()
    Return the basket book list.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      List of books added to basket.

      public BasketList()
      Initialize new array list.

  • Method Details

    • getBasketList

      public ArrayList<BasketBook> getBasketList()
      Return the basket book list.
      Returns:
      - basket list.

    • add

      public void add(Book book)
      Get a book and if doesn't exist add this book to the list, if it is existing already - increase quantity of this book by 1.
      Parameters:
      book - - The book to add to the basket list.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clear the list.

    • decreaseBook

      public void decreaseBook(long idBook)
      Get an ID of a book and decrease 1 book in the basket that has the same ID, and if the quantity of this particular book reach to 0 then delete this book from the list.
      Parameters:
      idBook - - The ID of the book to decrease/erase from list.

    • deleteBook

      public void deleteBook(long idBook)
      Get an ID of a book and delete the book in the list that has this ID.
      Parameters:
      idBook - - the id of the book.

    • count

      public Integer count()
      Count how many items in the basket list (if a book is appearing twice its count for different items).
      Returns:
      - Number of items added to the basket.

    • findById

      public BasketBook findById(long idBook)
      Get an ID of a book and return the basket book item that correspond to this ID.
      Parameters:
      idBook - - The ID of the book.
      Returns:
      - The basket book with this ID if exist, else null.
